name: Operation of a motor carrier vehicle without a safety inspection decal
text: §286-210  Operation of a motor carrier vehicle without a safety inspection decal.  Whoever operates, permits the operation of, causes to be operated, or parks any motor carrier vehicle on a public highway without a current motor carrier vehicle safety inspection decal, issued under section 286-209, shall be fined $100 for each day of the violation. [L Sp 1977 1st, c 20, pt of §1; am L 1993, c 214, §9]
